Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute near 18th/Racine
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses temp. rerouted WB: Roosevelt, Ashland, and 18th; EB: 18th, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near 18th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 18th/Racine, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Ashland, and 18th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 18th, Racine, and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
